alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Calhoun, Clarendon and southwestern Sumter Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Santee State Park, or 16 miles west of Manning, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manning, Summerton, Alcolu, Poinsett State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Turbeville, Pinewood, Paxville, Rimini, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Foreston, Gable, Davis Station, Lone Star, and Low Falls Landing. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 109 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
